description: Formal schema for the COTC Governance Vector Model, mapping governance contracts across AI roles, industries, regulations, asset types, risk classes, and actor types.

vector.subject: string (summary of governed activity or behavior)
included: string (key AI functions, decisions, or assets affected)
relevant: string (constraints, risks, compliance requirements, or failure conditions)

cotc_integration.level: string (e.g., prompt, output, validator, multi-agent chain)
cotc_integration.enforcement: string (e.g., schema, epistemic scoring, fallback protocol, audit requirement)
cotc_integration.reflex: boolean (true if runtime governance or reactivity is required)

vector.asset_type: string (e.g., model, dataset, output, autonomous agent)
vector.actor_type: string (e.g., human user, autonomous agent, multi-agent chain, toolchain component)

rag_reference.used: boolean (true if RAG applies to the context)
failure_modes: string (how RAG falls short in this context)
